page.description: The Radio Button Control has the following methods. The radio button control methods are used with a pointer to the control in the following way: .METHOD(). Refer to Retrieving a Pointer to a Control for techniques for getting a pointer.

case.title: .ACTIVATE()
case.description: Sets focus to the object.

case.title: .CHILD()
case.description: Returns an object pointer to the Nth child of the object, or the child object called Object_Name.

case.title: .CHILD_ENUM()
case.description: Returns a CR-LF separated list of all the child objects on the form, in tab order.

case.title: .CHILDREN()
case.description: Returns the number of objects that a container object contains. Returns zero if the object is not a container.

case.title: .CLASS()
case.description: Returns the class (i.e., type) of the object.

case.title: .CONTAINER_GET()
case.description: Returns the name of the control's container.

case.title: .DISABLE()
case.description: Makes a form unable to receive focus. May also gray the object. Works with fields, buttons, check boxes, etc.

case.title: .ENABLE()
case.description: Makes an object able to receive focus.

case.title: .EVAL()
case.description: Interprets a string as Xbasic code.

case.title: .FIELD_GET()
case.description: Returns a pointer to the table field bound to the control.

case.title: .HAS_METHOD()
case.description: Returns .T. (TRUE) if the form supports the specified method.

case.title: .HIDE()
case.description: Hides an object.

case.title: .KINDOF()
case.description: Returns the kind of object represented by a form.

case.title: .NAME()
case.description: Returns the object name.

case.title: .REFERENCE_EXPRESSION_GET()
case.description: Returns the reference expression to reconstruct a reference to the object.

case.title: .REFRESH()
case.description: Forces a control to re-fetch data from its data source, and then to repaint itself. Works with all controls.

case.title: .REPAINT()
case.description: Re-displays a control.

case.title: .SESSIONHANDLE()
case.description: Returns the session handle associated with the object.

case.title: .SHOW()
case.description: Shows an object that may previously have been hidden using the .HIDE() method. Works with fields, buttons, check boxes, text, lines and most other objects on forms.

case.title: .TEXTREPLACE()
case.description: Replaces selected text in a text control.

case.title: .TEXTSELECT()
case.description: Selects text in a text control.

case.title: .TYPE()
case.description: Returns the type of data bound to an object.
